titleStmt.title: Iacobs wel, and Abbots conduit paralleled, preached, and applied (in the cathedrall and metropoliticall Church of Christ in Canterbury) to the vse of that citie; now to make glad the citie of God. By Iames Cleland, Doctor of Diuinitie.
titleStmt.author: Cleland, James, d. 1627.
Pass, Simon van de, 1595?-1647, engraver.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by William Stansby] for Robert Allot,

notesStmt.note: With an additional title page, engraved.
The frontispiece is an engraved portrait of George Abbot signed: Simon Pass√¶us sculp: Lond:.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
